name: Design Tokens Playground
description:
Here's a little but nice playground for you start managing design tokens.


What is new:


v.1.0.1 - 07/01/2022


-Just synchronized Figma Token with a local file.


v.1.0.0 - 05/01/2022


- New Foundations Tokens

- Alias Tokens Added

- Components Tokens Added


Json compatible with Figma Token Plugin.


Enjoy it!
